text: Li Jinyu (born 30 January 2001 in Heilongjiang) is a female Chinese short track speed skater. She competed at the 2018 Winter Olympics for China. ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female speed skaters Category:Chinese female short track speed skaters Category:Short track speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic short track speed skaters of China Category:Medalists at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for China Category:Olympic medalists in short track speed skating Category:Sportspeople from Heilongjiang Category:World Short Track Speed Skating Championships medalists
title: Li Jinyu (speed skater)
